question: Can I qualify for a mortgage with an annual income of $85,000 and a credit score of 680?
true_answer: Yes, with a credit score of 680 and a calculated DTI of 35%, you are eligible. Typical down payment ranges from 3-20%.

steps.content: Can I qualify for a mortgage with an annual income of $85,000 and a credit score of 680?
Plan: 1) Confirm eligibility with home_loan_agent. 2) Credit score check with credit_agent. 3) Calculate DTI. 4) Supervisory evaluation. 5) Provide response.
Eligibility generally requires a credit score above 620 and DTI under 43%.
Credit score 680 is acceptable, higher than the minimum required 620.
Calculating debt-to-income ratio with assumed expenses.
Debt-to-income ratio calculated as 35%, well within acceptable limits.
What would be the required down payment?
Looking up standard down payment requirements.
Down payment typically ranges from 3% to 20% based on the loan type.
Yes, with a credit score of 680 and a calculated DTI of 35%, you are eligible. Typical down payment ranges from 3-20%.
